title: A collection of characters.
content:
This is a collection of Linotype, Monotype, wood, plaster and rubber font characters for your enjoyment.   
   
Does anyone have any other font characters on different material?   
   
I scanned this directly as a collection but next time I would photograph it first.   
   
 ![collection.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017220809im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/16527.gif)
author: gln

comments.content:
Cool stuff.   
   
Joke trivia question:   
Who was the punchcutter of the vegetable in that scan? ;-\>   
   
BTW, scanning directly is usually great - you'd need really good photo equipment to better it. Check out these:   
 [http://www.themicrofoundry.com/other/Pascal60.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017220809/http:/www.themicrofoundry.com/other/Pascal60.jpg)   
 [http://www.themicrofoundry.com/other/euclid\_b.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017220809/http:/www.themicrofoundry.com/other/euclid_b.gif)   
   
hhp
